fields.title: Roasted White Bean and Pea Pesto Bowl
fields.description: A nourishing bowl with roasted white beans, pine nuts, fresh tomatoes, hummus, and a vibrant pea pesto.
fields.instructions: 1. Roast the white beans with olive oil and seasoning. 2. Blend peas, garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil for the pesto. 3. Assemble with tomatoes, pine nuts, hummus, and pesto.

fields.title: Asian Cabbage and Tomato Stir-fry
fields.description: A flavorful Asian stir-fry with cabbage, tomato seasoning, topped with pistachios and almonds.
fields.instructions: 1. Stir-fry cabbage with tomato paste and soy sauce. 2. Top with roasted pistachios and almonds.

fields.title: Baked Eggs with Greens
fields.description: A hearty baked egg dish filled with greens, perfect for serving with toast.
fields.instructions: 1. Saute greens. 2. Crack eggs into a baking dish. 3. Bake until eggs are set. Serve with toast.

fields.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Bowl
fields.description: A bowl with roasted chickpeas, pitta bread, figs, edamame, olive salad, cucumber, and yoghurt.
fields.instructions: 1. Roast chickpeas. 2. Prepare salad and slice figs. 3. Assemble bowl with pita and yoghurt drizzle.

fields.title: Healthy Yellow Chicken Curry
fields.description: A healthy, fragrant yellow chicken curry served with rice.
fields.instructions: 1. Saute onions and spices. 2. Add chicken. 3. Simmer with coconut milk until cooked.
